topics.title: All-in-One Boards
topics.description: Some of them are all-in-one boards that make for really clean simple installations.

topics.title: Connecting Camera to Flight Controller
topics.description: The speaker describes how to connect a camera to a flight controller, which sends the signal to goggles for first-person view (FPV).
evidence_quotes: connect the video from the camera into the flight controller
then you connect a video out from the flight controller into the video transmitter

topics.title: DJI Air Unit Differences
topics.description: The speaker notes that the DJI Air unit works slightly differently than other flight controllers, and only supports beta flight for now.
evidence_quotes: only support is really for beta flight

topics.title: Firmware Options
topics.description: Explanation of three common firmware options (BetaFlight, iNav, and ArduPilot) and their features.

topics.title: Flight Controller Features
topics.description: The speaker explains that modern flight controllers are smarter than older ones, and provide overlays of key flight information such as battery voltage, distance from home, and flight mode.

topics.title: Flight Controller Options
topics.description: There are loads and loads of flight controller options.

topics.title: Flight Controller Program
topics.description: A program that goes onto a computer and is used to flash or upload firmware onto a hardware flight controller.

topics.title: On-Screen Display Support
topics.description: The speaker explains that some flight controllers have built-in support for on-screen displays, while others may require additional boards.

topics.title: Radio Controls
topics.description: Discussion about the radio controls and their functions.
evidence_quotes: [00:14:05.180] that's in your hand there are lots of other options available
[00:14:13.880] loads of other different ways that people can use

topics.title: UARTs and I2C
topics.description: Some of the larger flight controllers will have lots of UARTs for places where you can plug stuff in.
